Title: Meeruthiya Gangsters
Writer: Zeishan Quadri (story), Pradip Atluri (screenplay), Gibran Noorani (screenplay), Zeishan Quadri (screenplay), Gunjan Saxena (screenplay)
Actors: Jaideep Ahlawat, Aakash Dahiya, Jatin Sarna, Shadab Kamal
Plot: Unemployed college students becomes Gangsters to fulfil their financial needs and events followed by their decision to be Gangster in the the backdrop of Meerut City of India.
